Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI supports me to understand concepts in a way that makes sense to me with how I process new information. I take a while to fully understand new concepts and like to have it explained simply and without jargon, so using GenAI to help me learn has been a God send, especially as an online student.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is really good at offering supportive feedback while also providing constructive feedback too. Because I have input my preferences for the language it uses in our chats it gels well with my communication style. This is not something I can do with teachers, though I have felt most feedback I've received from teachers/markers at Deakin has been really great too, but of course the feedback is not consistent like GenAI is because the markers and teachers change for each new unit.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
